grandfather{grandchild: A, grandfather: C} :-
  parent{child: A, parent: B} &
  father{child: B, father: C}.
----
application/datalog
grandfather{grandchild: A, grandfather: C}.
grandfather{grandchild: A, grandfather: C}.
grandfather{grandchild: A, grandfather: C}.
grandfather{grandchild: A, grandfather: C}.
grandfather{grandchild: A, grandfather: C}.
grandfather{grandchild: A, grandfather: C}.
grandfather{grandchild: A, grandfather: C}.
grandfather{grandchild: A, grandfather: C}.
grandfather{grandchild: A, grandfather: C}.

greatGrandfather{grandchild: A, grandfather: D} :-
  parent{child: A, parent: B} &
  parent{child: B, parent: C} &
  father{child: C, father: D}.
----
application/datalog
greatGrandfather{grandchild: A, grandfather: D}.
greatGrandfather{grandchild: A, grandfather: D}.
greatGrandfather{grandchild: A, grandfather: D}.
greatGrandfather{grandchild: A, grandfather: D}.
greatGrandfather{grandchild: A, grandfather: D}.
greatGrandfather{grandchild: A, grandfather: D}.
greatGrandfather{grandchild: A, grandfather: D}.

greatGrandfather{grandchild: A, grandfather: D}.

greatGrandfather{grandchild: A, grandfather: D}.
greatGrandfather{grandchild: A, grandfather: D}.
greatGrandfather{grandchild: A, grandfather: D}.
greatGrandfather{grandchild: A, grandfather: D}.
greatGrandfather{grandchild: A, grandfather: D}.
greatGrandfather{grandchild: A, grandfather: D}.
greatGrandfather{grandchild: A, grandfather: D}.

greatGrandfather{grandchild: A, grandfather: D}.
greatGrandfather{grandchild: A, grandfather: D}.
